title: Pairing the Electronic Steering Lock

body.body: There must be at least one key registered before the electronic steering lock can be paired to the keyless ECM.
Power the motorcycle ON using a paired key.
Navigate to CHASSIS DIAGNOSTICS - IMMOBILISER DIAGNOSTICS - Configure.
Upon clicking Pair, a five minute (300 second) security time delay will be initiated. Do not leave the motorcycle unattended during this time.
Click Pair Electronic Steering Lock. The five minute (300 second) security time delay will begin.
The pairing will completed after the time delay has elapsed. The Triumph diagnostic tool will report if the pairing has been successful.
